import React from 'react' import Player from '../Music/Player' import MyNavBar from './MyNavBar' import SideBarRight from './SideBarRight' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { Container, Row, Col, Card, ListGroupItem, ListGroup } from 'react-bootstrap' const ProfilePage = () => { const currentUser = useSelector(state => state.users.getcurrentuser) return ( <>
{ (
{/* {currentUser.image} {currentUser.firstName} {currentUser.lastName} {currentUser.email} {currentUser.city} */}

User Profile

Name: {currentUser.firstName} {currentUser.lastName}
Email: {currentUser.email}
Location: {currentUser.city}
{/* */}
{/* */}
{/*
*/} )} ) } export default ProfilePage
